SELECT H.NO, H.TITLE, M.NICK AS MEMBER_NO, H.STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, H.SECRET_YN, H.PASSWORD
FROM HELP H JOIN MEMBER M ON H.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{mNo} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT P.NO AS NO, P.TITLE AS TITLE , M.NICK AS CREATOR, P.STATUS AS STATUS, P.CATEGORY as CATEGORY, PA.CHANGE_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME
FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.CREATOR = M.NO INNER JOIN LIKE_PROJECT LP ON LP.PRJ_NO = P.NO left outer JOIN PRJ_ATTACHMENT PA ON PA.PRJ_NO = P.NO
WHERE LP.M_NO = #{mNo} AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY LP.LIKE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE NO IN ( SELECT LIKE_MEMBER_NO FROM LIKE_MEMBER WHERE M_NO = #{mNo} )
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE NO IN ( SELECT M_NO FROM LIKE_MEMBER WHERE LIKE_MEMBER_NO = #{mNo} )

SELECT R.NO, R.TITLE, SUBSTR(P.TITLE,1,15) AS PRJ, R.STATUS, TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE
FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REPORTER = M.NO JOIN PROJECT P ON P.NO = R.PRJ WHERE REPORTER = #{mNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
